properties.areaDesc: Keweenaw; Gogebic; Ontonagon; Houghton; Southern Houghton; Baraga
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 6 at 3:21PM EST until January 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow and areas of blowing snow expected.
Total snow accumulations of 3 to locally 7 inches, greatest over
the higher terrain from the Porcupine Mountains through the
spine of the Keweenaw Peninsula. Northwest winds gusting from 30
to 40 mph, highest over the Keweenaw Peninsula.

* WHERE...Portions of central Upper and western Upper Michigan.

* WHEN...From 11 AM EST /10 AM CST/ Tuesday to 1 AM EST
/midnight CST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions from the snowfall.
The gusty winds will also create areas of blowing snow which could
significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could
impact the Tuesday evening commute.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM EST /10 AM CST/ TUESDAY TO 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ WEDNESDAY
